to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: editing speech.conf
body:
Hello tomas,
the problem is a different one: Michael always wants to open a file 
named speech.conf, and he will never, never succeed!
The correct name is
/etc/speech-dispatcher/speechd.conf
For those who don't use a braille display: Every good screen reader, 
including Speakup and Orca, has a function to spell out words; so 
please, please use it!
Hermann
